document.full_text: the story of the shaggs, a bad band that became something of a legend, is based on an actual footnote in rock 'n' roll history.
document.title: theater review | 'the shaggs: philosophy of the world': three sisters, a deluded dad and some wretched rock
lines_and_colors: the story of the shaggs, a bad band that became something of a legend, is based on an actual footnote in rock 'n' roll history.
